Description:
Detects system information discovery commands

Author: Ömer Günal, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Information Discovery
Query: sourcetype="linux-*" (process_path="*/uname" OR process_path="*/hostname" OR process_path="*/uptime" OR process_path="*/lspci" OR process_path="*/dmidecode" OR process_path="*/lscpu" OR process_path="*/lsmod")
